text: Tyane tumha sarvanna ekaca jivapasuna nirmana kele, maga tyapasuna tyaci jodi nirmana keli ani tumacyakarita janavarampaiki atha jode (nara-mada) avatarita kele. To tumhala tumacya matancya garbhamadhye eka svarupanantara dusarya svarupata ghadavito, tina tina andharamadhye haca allaha tumaca raba (svami va palanakarta) ahe tyacyacakarita rajyasatta ahe, tyacyakherija konihi upasya nahi. Maga tumhi kothe bhatakata jata ahata
